title: About
text:
I am a PhD student in cognitive science and machine learning. My research focuses on LLM interpretability, AI alignment, and representation learning. I work in the Institute for Human-Centered AI located at Helmholtz Munich and am a student at the Technical University of Munich.
I like teaching myself and others about various technical topics. For the same reason, I am also an instructor with the Software Carpentry and have taught workshops on different computational topics.
